introduction.title: üè¢ Introduction
introduction.content: Huang Shan Global is a pioneer in the field of China-Vietnam import-export and logistics, specializing in providing comprehensive solutions from transportation, ordering, payment processing, to importing specialized machinery. With our own warehouse system and transportation fleet in both China and Vietnam, along with an experienced team, Huang Shan Global is committed to providing fast - safe - transparent - cost-effective services to all customers.

mission.title: üéØ Mission
mission.content: We exist to help businesses, retailers and individuals easily access quality Chinese goods, optimize costs, minimize risks and increase profits. Huang Shan Global accompanies customers in every order, every step of development.

vision.title: üëÅÔ∏è Vision
vision.content: Huang Shan Global aims to become the No.1 logistics and import-export brand in Vietnam in the field of trade with China, while expanding international networks, building a comprehensive service ecosystem, and establishing a position in the Southeast Asian market.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Commitment to on-time delivery, right goods, right quality.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Optimal service, reasonable cost, enhancing customer profit.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear process, accurate information, no hidden costs.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: 1:1 customer service, 24/7 support, always by customer's side in every situation.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving services, applying technology to enhance experience.

about.conclusion: With these values, Huang Shan Global is not only a transportation and import company, but also a strategic partner helping customers confidently expand their business and reach further.

logistics_coordinator.title: Logistics Coordinator
logistics_coordinator.description: Responsible for coordinating China-Vietnam freight transportation, managing import/export processes and working with logistics partners.
logistics_coordinator.requirements: University degree in Logistics/Commerce|At least 2 years experience in logistics|Good Chinese communication skills|Proficient in office software|Ability to work under pressure
logistics_coordinator.benefits: Basic salary + performance bonus|Full insurance coverage|Learning and development opportunities|Dynamic working environment|Annual company trips

warehouse_manager.title: Warehouse Manager
warehouse_manager.description: Manage all warehouse operations, supervise inbound/outbound activities, ensure cargo safety and optimize warehouse processes.
warehouse_manager.requirements: 3-5 years warehouse management experience|Knowledge of import/export processes|Good team management skills|Proficient in warehouse management software|Problem analysis and solving abilities
warehouse_manager.benefits: Competitive salary based on capacity|Monthly/quarterly KPI bonuses|Premium health insurance|Regular professional training|Fast promotion opportunities

customer_service.title: Customer Service Representative
customer_service.description: Advise and support customers about company services, handle complaints and maintain good customer relationships.
customer_service.requirements: High school graduate or above|1+ years customer service experience|Good communication and negotiation skills|Basic computer skills|Patient and friendly personality
customer_service.benefits: Stable salary + commission|Professional skills training|Friendly working environment|Career development opportunities|Flexible leave policy

sales_executive.title: Sales Executive
sales_executive.description: Find and develop new customers, maintain relationships with existing customers, achieve assigned sales targets.
sales_executive.requirements: University degree in related fields|2-4 years sales experience|Excellent sales and negotiation skills|Independent work ability|Chinese language is an advantage
sales_executive.benefits: Basic salary + attractive commission|Target achievement bonuses|Travel expense support|Sales skills training|Year-end bonus policy

new_logistics_center.title: Huang Shan Global Opens New Logistics Center in Hanoi
new_logistics_center.excerpt: Our latest logistics facility in Hanoi strengthens the China-Vietnam trade route with advanced automation and 24/7 operations.
new_logistics_center.content: We are pleased to announce the opening of our newest logistics center in Hanoi, marking a significant milestone in expanding our China-Vietnam trade operations. This state-of-the-art facility spans 10,000 square meters and features advanced warehouse management systems, automated sorting technology, and round-the-clock operations to better serve our growing customer base.

trade_partnership.title: Strategic Partnership with Leading Chinese Manufacturers
trade_partnership.excerpt: New partnerships enable faster delivery times and reduced costs for import-export operations between China and Vietnam.
trade_partnership.content: Huang Shan Global has established strategic partnerships with three major Chinese manufacturers, creating a more efficient supply chain for our clients. These partnerships will reduce delivery times by up to 30% and lower shipping costs through optimized routing and consolidated shipments.

digital_transformation.title: Digital Transformation: New Tracking System Launch
digital_transformation.excerpt: Our new real-time tracking system provides complete visibility throughout the entire shipping process from origin to destination.
digital_transformation.content: We have launched our advanced digital tracking system, offering customers unprecedented visibility into their shipments. The system provides real-time updates, estimated delivery times, and detailed tracking information accessible through our website and mobile app.

sustainability_initiative.title: Green Logistics Initiative: Reducing Carbon Footprint
sustainability_initiative.excerpt: Huang Shan Global commits to sustainable logistics practices with new green transportation and packaging solutions.
sustainability_initiative.content: As part of our commitment to environmental responsibility, we have launched our Green Logistics Initiative. This comprehensive program includes electric vehicle adoption, sustainable packaging materials, and route optimization to reduce our carbon footprint by 40% over the next three years.

trade_regulations_2024.title: New Trade Regulations Between China and Vietnam in 2024
trade_regulations_2024.excerpt: Important updates on trade regulations affecting import-export operations and documentation requirements.
trade_regulations_2024.content: The latest trade regulations between China and Vietnam introduce new documentation requirements and simplified customs procedures. Our team has prepared comprehensive guides to help clients navigate these changes effectively and maintain compliance with all regulatory requirements.

logistics_awards.title: Huang Shan Global Receives Excellence in Logistics Award
logistics_awards.excerpt: Recognition for outstanding service quality and innovation in China-Vietnam logistics solutions.
logistics_awards.content: We are honored to receive the Excellence in Logistics Award from the Vietnam Logistics Business Association. This recognition acknowledges our commitment to service quality, technological innovation, and contribution to strengthening trade relationships between China and Vietnam.
